title: Drawing, "Jar with Two Flat Sides, Capston Glass Co.", February 16, 1932
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower margin: HENRY DREYFUSS . 580 FIFTH AVENUE . NEW YORK . BRYANT 8638; lower right: FEB 16 1932
inscribed: Inscribed in red crayon, lower right: 46 [encircled]
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Jar with two flat sides, its plan and two small versions below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jar with Two Flat Sides, Capston Glass Co.", February 16, 1932.
February 16, 1932. Graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-110.
